channel.title: Comments on: Happy Weekend: “Waiter, my sausage is smiling at me”
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Lens: An Ode to the Maybachufer | Collidoscope Berlin
item.dc:creator: Lens: An Ode to the Maybachufer | Collidoscope Berlin
item.description: […] spots in Kreuzberg, but the Maybachufer canal is perhaps one that most poignantly displays the cultural fusion that makes Kreuzberg a very special place to call […]

item.title: By: Collidoscope Berlin
item.dc:creator: Collidoscope Berlin
item.description: Sarah, when you come to Berlin I promise you tofu octopus sausages and much more. ;)

item.title: By: sarah michael
item.dc:creator: sarah michael
item.description: i want to try that tofu octopus sausage!! it all sounds very fun. i wish i could go with you!!
item.content:encoded: i want to try that tofu octopus sausage!! it all sounds very fun. i wish i could go with you!!
